name: Legend of Zesperia (misfitstudio)
description:
This game is a game with RPG Adventure genre, and is Exploring which in its game controls a play character who is exploring the island and passing all obstacles to save the crimes that are on the island. Main Character, will travel to explore places where there are events in it as a storyline. In events, the Main character can also determine choices that will make a different impact from the choice.

This game is rooted in the theme of Unity in Diversity. Through the game "Legend of Zesperia", it will make the Player feel the feud between various groups or conflicts that occur due to differences in idealism.
The game "Legend of Zesperia" can only be played by one player and is intended for Windows desktop platforms. This game is also included in the E (Everyone) rating with a target age of at least 6 years.
